sentences.sContent: The judge called the decision "a flagrant violation of international law."
sentences.sCn: 法官称这个决定是“对国际法的公然违反”。

synos.tran: 公然的；不能容忍的；非常的；恶名昭著的（名词flagrancy，副词flagrantly）

words.tran: 千真万确地；罪大恶极地

trans.tranCn: 公然的；不能容忍的；非常的；臭名远扬的；明目张胆的；恶名昭著的（名词flagrancy，副词flagrantly）
trans.tranOther: a flagrant action is shocking because it is done in a way that is easily noticed and shows no respect for laws, truth etc
